word:
My husband never stood in my way to do this, although I had help and encouragement from him, and oft his pity.  His sympathy and prayers and tears I have missed so much, so very much.  No one can understand this as myself. But my work has to be done.  No human 
                                                                           121
power should give the least supposition that I would be influenced in the work God has given me to do in bearing my testimony to those for whom He has given me reproof or encouragement.
